7F000000 7F000000 7F800000	# 2^+127			x	2^+127			= overflow_o, infinity_o (entrada infinita)
7C400000 7E400000 7F800000	# 2^+121			x	2^+125			= overflow_o, infinity_o (entrada infinita)
7F000000 41C00000 7F800000	# 2^+127			x	2^+4			= overflow_o
7F000000 40400000 7FFFFFFF	# 2^+127			x	3			= overflow_o, o resultado é um NaN ESTE PODE DAR PROBLEMA
7F000000 40800000 7FFFFFFF 	# 2^+127			x	2^+2			= overflow_o
41200000 41C80000 437A0000	# 10				x 	25			= 250
42DC0000 3F800000 42DC0000	# 110				x 	1			= 110
3F800000 00000000 00000000	# 1				x 	0			= zero
3F800000 3F800000 3F800000	# 1				x 	1			= 1
00000000 41C84444 00000000	# 0				x 	25.03333282470703 	= zero
7F800000 41C84444 7FFFFFFF	# infinity 			x 	25.03333282470703	= overflow_o, infinit
00800000 00800000 00000000	# 2^-126			x	2^-126			= "0" underflow
7F900000 41D00000 00000000	# nan				x 	26			= nan (00000000)
42DC0000 3F800000 42DC0000	# 110				x 	1			= 110
3fffffff 7F100000 7FFFFFFF	# 1,99				x	1.9140883e+38		= overflow_o, o resultado é um NaN
403945DE C9743800 ca30bf1e	# 2.8948893547058105 		x 	-1000320 		= -2895815.8 Round to Zero  ou ca30bf1f Round to Nearest Even"
07e00000 57e00000 20440000	# 3.3703774026776627e-34	x	492581209243648		= 1.6601846E-19
64440f02 04478f02 2918d530	# 1.4466573061230378e+22	x	2.3458003548440554e-36	= 3.393569062912216e-14
3f9fd530 7e1fd530 7e479506	# 1.2486934661865234		x	5.311354602908263e+37	= 6.632253627189439e+37
97479506 c75ff506 1f2e99d6	# -6.44884619510154e-25		x	-57333.0234375		= 3.6973183310575984e-20
2918d530 7F800000 7FFFFFFF	# 3.393569062912216e-14		x	infinit			= , overflow infinit
c75ff506 7F900000 00000000	# -57333.0234375		x	nan			= nan (00000000)
e32000d6 632000d6 FFFFFFFF	# -2.9515393E21			x	2.9515393E21		= overflow e o resultado é negativo
c72360d6 c72360d6 4ed088ea	# -41824.836			x	-41824.836		= +1749316864
472360d6 c72360d6 ced088ea	# +41824.836			x	-41824.836		= -1.74931686E9

NÚMEROS PARA TESTAR ZERO SUJO
00800000 34000000 00800001	# 1,0 x 2^-126		x	2^-23			= 2^-23 x 2^-126 = 2^-149
